original_text: Lord, please make me well again. Then I will be completely well. Rescue me so that I am completely safe. You are the one that I praise! Lord, please make me well again.
korean_text: 여호와여 주는 나의 찬송이시오니 나를 고치소서 그리하시면 내가 낫겠나이다 나를 구원하소서 그리하시면 내가 구원을 얻으리이다

sentences.original_text: Lord, please make me well again.
Then I will be completely well.
Rescue me so that I am completely safe.
You are the one that I praise!
Lord, please make me well again.
